form.title: Paste your password, secret message, or private link below
form.subtitle: Do not store any confidential information in your emails or chat threads.

whatIsIt.title: What is Secret Manager?
whatIsIt.content: Secret Manager is a secure management solution for your secrets, passwords, and other sensitive information. It allows you to securely store your confidential data and share it with your colleagues or friends in a secure manner.

howToUse.title: How does it work?
howToUse.content: To use Secret Manager, start by inserting your confidential information into the dedicated field. Then, set a password, expiration time, and/or usage limit as needed. Once these settings are defined, click "Create a secret link" to generate a secure link. This link can be shared with your colleagues or friends, who can access your content by clicking the link and entering the password.

modal.title: Your secret has been created!
modal.content: Your secret has been successfully created. You can now share the link below with your colleagues or friends. Don't forget to provide them with the password so they can access your content.

buttons.copy: Copy the link to the clipboard

passwordPrompt.title: Password required
passwordPrompt.subtitle: This secret is protected by a password. If you do not have the password, please ask the person who shared this secret with you to provide it.

secret.title: Here is the content of your secret

file.warning: The secret must have been downloaded automatically. If not, please click the button below.
